subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Derrick Rose had 30 points and 10 assists, helping the Chicago Bulls move back into the Eastern Conference lead — a half-game ahead of Boston — with a 114-81 win over Atlanta.
snippet: Derrick Rose had 30 points and 10 assists, helping the Chicago Bulls move back into the Eastern Conference lead — a half-game ahead of Boston — with a 114-81 win over Atlanta.
